1370: Abben was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Emgelberna at age 28 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Emgelberna, Blomart, at age 29.
1372: Had a daughter with Emgelberna, Breghlent, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Emgelberna, Remsindis, at age 35.
1378: Lost daughter Remsindis when Remsindis was 2 years old.
1379: Had a son with Emgelberna, Remboldus, at age 37.
1380: Had a daughter with Emgelberna, Thedwi, at age 38.
1382: Had a son with Emgelberna, Godino, at age 40.
1383: Had a son with Emgelberna, Rampe, at age 41.
1386: Lost his wife Emgelberna while she was giving birth to Lielde in 1386.
Lost daughter Lielde when Lielde was 1 years old.
